#### About Me {.index-h4}
## Biography & Status {.index-h2}

1. I am a dedicated **wildlife ecologist** and **geospatial practitioner** interested in advancing the science behind natural resource conservation. My work focuses on using a variety of data science and geospatial tools to research and inform the natural world.

2. I have over 7 years of progressive experience with government, academic, and private entities in the **conservation and environmental science** sector. My diverse professional tasks have included everything from technical reporting and spatial modeling to immobilizing wild black bears.

3. I am currently pursuing my **Masters in Geography** at the University of Missouri. I will provide updates on my thesis work as I begin progress on my project. Please [reach out](contact.qmd) if you have any inquires or would like to collaborate on any ecological or geospatial projects.


:::
